p: The antibacterial activity of the essential oil and of 1,8-cineole was tested, at different amounts, on five bacterial strains, belonging to both Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteriaâ€”namely Staphylococcus aureus, Bacillus cereus (4313), and B. cereus (4384) representative of the Gram-positive; and Escherichia coli and Pseudomonas aeruginosa characteristics Gram-negative bacteria. The results of the activity, namely the inhibition of the diameters calculated as mm, are given in Table 2.
